targets.query:
from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "distro_spread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "dockerhub")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pulls")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _time: r._time, _field: "${r.org}/${r.image}"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "distro_spread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "dockerhub")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stars")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _time: r._time, _field: "${r.org}/${r.image}"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Total EPEL hits per each distribution.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "distro_spread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "epel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["image"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hits")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _time: r._time, _field: "${r.org}"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "vagrantup")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pulls")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _time: r._time, _field: "${r.org}/${r.image}"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alma_social")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "chat.almalinux.org")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alma_social")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "reddit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_users")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "reddit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_users")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alma_social")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "github")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["repo"] == "almalinux-deploy" or r["repo"] == "rocky-tools")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stars")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alma_social")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "github")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["repo"] == "almalinux-deploy" or r["repo"] == "rocky-tools")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "forks")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

from(bucket: "distro_spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["platform"] == "github")
